name: Shopify Theme Icons
tagline: An icon font specifically built for Shopify themes
body:
### Customised Icons for Shopify Themes
This is a reasonably light custom font for including in Shopify themes, that includes icons that are generally needed for online shops. The font includes social media icons, payment icons, user and cart icons, and other useful glyphs.

### Authors and Contributors
@cam and the @elkfox team produce and maintain this project, with help from the amazing [Font Custom](http://fontcustom.com) project, Font Awesome, Homebrew and [FontForge](http://fontforge.github.io).

### Support or Contact
Get in touch with us at http://elkfox.com or the GitHub issues tracker for feedback and suggestions.
